title: Son of Strange Sex (CRE209)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In the ninth episode from our second season, Rich Fulcher, the Sklar Bros, Peaches Christ and Kevin Allison tell true stories of sex gone weird.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (The Sklar Brothers, Rich Fulcher, Joshua Grannell (aka Peaches Christ), Shawn Lee, Original German Cast of "Hair", Mike Phirman, diNbOT, Animals Within Animals, Go Home Productions, Jeff Barr, Kevin Allison)
